headline: 1 Crucial Thing Investors Are Missing About Procter & Gamble's Sales
summary: In what's become something of a habit, Procter & Gamble (NYSE: PG) surprised on the upside in its second quarter of fiscal 2025.  Procter & Gamble managed to boost its net sales by 2% year over year during the quarter to just under $21.9 billion.  The really admirable aspect to this is that Procter & Gamble engineered this growth without raising prices, its time-honored tactic to help juice top-line increases.
